endow.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to give a college, hospital etc a large sum of money that provides it with an income
endow.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to give a sum of money to a college, hospital etc in order to give it an income
endow.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He planned the museum and helped raise the $55 million to build and endow it.
